fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Plunder: When the Merchant event arrives, gain 3 cards of your choice instead of 1.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pillage: Steal 1 card from a player. [3 uses, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Cannon: Remove the room/barrier restriction from any card. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Threaten: When in a trade, take all cards from the opposing player. [1 use, Unique]
- Intimidate: Prevent half of the Order members from drawing this phase. [1 use, Unique, Post-Mortem]
